tool_description:
The Redirect/Broken Link Detector API allows you to identify dead links in your website URL. It checks all redirects and returns the data about each link. An email notification is sent if there are any broken links.

In case you have specific requirements or would like to have custom API then => https://www.entamatrix.tech
name: Broken Link Detector
title: Broken Link Detector

api_list.name: Broken Link
